metadata.title: CVE-2018-6142 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Array bounds check failure in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 67.0.3396.62allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory read via acrafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libv8-3.14: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
